scripts.build: bun build runtime/runtime.ts --target=browser --outfile=frontend/static/runtime.js --minify --external http --external https --external zlib --external fs --external path --external crypto --external stream --external buffer --external url --external net --external tls --external os --external util
scripts.serve:dev: bun build runtime/runtime.ts --target=browser --outfile=frontend/static/runtime.js --minify --external http --external https --external zlib --external fs --external path --external crypto --external stream --external buffer --external url --external net --external tls --external os --external util && bun run serve.ts
scripts.ui:build: cd ui && bun run build && bash ../scripts/notify.sh 'UI build complete' 'XLN Agent' 'ui/dist ready'
scripts.test:e2e:notify: bunx playwright test && bash ./scripts/notify.sh 'E2E passed' 'XLN Agent' || bash ./scripts/notify.sh 'E2E failed' 'XLN Agent' 'See report' 'Basso'
scripts.test: cd jurisdictions && echo '[INFO] Contract tests now run as part of deployment cycle (see deploy-contracts.sh)'
scripts.build:static: cd frontend && bun run build:static && echo '[OK] Static build complete for GitHub Pages'
scripts.build:deploy: npm run build:static && echo '[LAUNCH] Ready for GitHub Pages deployment'
scripts.test:contracts:r2r: cd jurisdictions && bunx hardhat run test-r2r-post-deployment.cjs --network localhost
scripts.test:governance: cd jurisdictions && npx hardhat test --grep governance
scripts.test:entity: cd jurisdictions && npx hardhat test --grep entity
scripts.check: bun x tsc --noEmit && cd frontend && bun run check
scripts.env:deploy: cd ./jurisdictions && npx hardhat ignition deploy ignition/modules/Depository.ts  --network localhost
scripts.docs:governance: echo 'See vibepaper/governance-architecture.md for comprehensive governance documentation'
scripts.demo: echo 'See vibepaper/governance-architecture.md for governance demo and examples'
